description: A matte lipstick that features a long-lasting, buildable, and hydrating formula.
A clean, vegan, hydrating soft-matte lipstick, powered by nourishing cocoa butter for lasting lightweight color.
A weightless air-whipped lip cream that hugs lips with rich color and nourishing hydration that gives a soft velvety matte finish.
A comfortable and intensely pigmented semi-matte lipstick with an innovative square-bullet shape for precise application
